title: Stockhorn
text:
The Stockhorn is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the <a href="Bernese%20Alps">Bernese Alps</a>, overlooking the region of <a href="Lake%20Thun">Lake Thun</a> in the <a href="Bernese%20Oberland">Bernese Oberland</a>. It is located north of the town of <a href="Erlenbach%20im%20Simmental">Erlenbach im Simmental</a>.
The Stockhorn is high and is accessible via cable car from Erlenbach. It has a restaurant at the top and is a good starting point for many hikes. There is good fishing in the two lakes right below the Stockhorn, the <a href="Oberstockensee">Oberstockensee</a> (around high) and the <a href="Hinterstockensee">Hinterstockensee</a> (around high). There is a subterranean water connection between the two lakes.
From the top the view includes many of the surrounding <a href="Alps">Alps</a>; the <a href="Eiger">Eiger</a>, <a href="M%C3%B6nch">Mönch</a>, <a href="Jungfrau">Jungfrau</a>, <a href="Schreckhorn">Schreckhorn</a>, along with the valley of the <a href="Aare">Aare</a> river, <a href="Thun">Thun</a> and Lake Thun, <a href="Interlaken">Interlaken</a> and the <a href="Jura%20Mountains">Jura Mountains</a>.
